data.title: Business Intelligence and Analytics software for everyone
data.meta_description: The company behind TARGIT Decision Suite, delivering easier ways to work with data, with actionable insights that improve profitability and productivity
data.text:
At TARGIT, we tailor our software to customers’ goals, requirements, and unique business environments by pairing our business intelligence (BI) expertise with a distinct focus on specific industries and operating platforms.

This approach ensures that our customers realize lasting value from their BI implementations and receive strategic support and guidance from our team of experts every step of the way.

Improve Airport Operations With Analytics

Turn data into actionable results,improve wait times, anddeliver an exceptionalpassenger experience from curb to gate. Use TARGIT to get a complete view of your operations and generate insights that enable informed, timely decisions. Learn more about Airport Solutions

Reporting for Car Dealerships

Gain unparalleled insight into your operating results with a reporting solution built exclusively for auto dealers. Our user-friendly, all-in-one solution gives you instant visibility into the numbers behind your operations, with intuitive reports for sales, after-sales, finance, and more. Learn more about Automotive Solutions

A Complete View of Your Operations

Streamline reporting and analysis by combining data from multiple operating systems inside TARGIT’s all-in-one BI solution. Use daily reports and interactive dashboards to track sales, manage inventory, andmonitor customer engagement across storelocations. Learn more about C-Stores & Wholesale Fuel Solutions

Reporting for Rental Businesses

Use data-driven insights to balance profitability with customer demands. TARGIT’s all-in-one BI solution makes it easy to track key metrics like rental financial utilization rate, equipment health, and overall fleet performance with automated reports and dashboards. Learn more about Equipment Rental Solutions

Informed Decisions in Every Department

Combine data from your DMS, ERP, and every other business system to get a complete view of your operations.Create daily reports and dashboards for sales, service, finance, and more, then compare performance between multiple locations. Learn more about Heavy Equipment Solutions

Insights Across Your Supply Chain

TARGIT’s BI solution gives you complete visibility and control over the entire manufacturing line. Use automated reports to analyze performance and inform decisions that boost overall equipment efficiency, decrease recall risk, and optimize operating costs. Learn more about Manufacturing Solutions

All-In-One BI Solution

Monitor performance and drive results across your dealership with daily reports and interactive dashboards. Streamline performance management with TARGIT’s intuitive, all-in-one BI solution for material handling equipment dealerships. Learn more about Material Handling Solutions

BI for the Public Sector

Increase efficiency and reduce administrative workload without compromising data quality. TARGIT gives you a comprehensive view of your operations so you can make informed decisions at your library, healthcare facility, educational institute, or government organization. Learn more about Public Sector Solutions

End-to-End Reporting for Dealers

Create automated reports and dashboards based on data from your DMS, payroll system, ERP platform, and any other tool you use to run your dealership. Then, use TARGIT’s user-friendly interface to equip everyone with the latest performance insights. Learn more about Truck & Trailer Solutions
